events.description: Join us for an outdoor garden wedding at Great Marsh Estate, where we'll say our vows and take our bows. Reception to follow immediately after.
events.title: Wedding Ceremony

location.address: 6105 Great Marsh Pl, Bealeton, VA 22712, USA
location.title: Great Marsh Estate

events.description: To be honest, the wedding party needs to snap a few photos around this time, so grab a drink and hang out by the bar. We'll be back before you know it.
events.title: Cocktail Hour

location.address: 6105 Great Marsh Pl, Bealeton, VA 22712, USA
location.title: Great Marsh Estate

events.description: Everyone's favorite part. I hope you packed your dancing shoes, because the bride and groom like to "drop it like it's hot."
events.title: Reception

location.address: 6105 Great Marsh Pl, Bealeton, VA 22712, USA
location.title: Great Marsh Estate

events.description: Let's keep the party alive and pretend we're much younger than we actually are. Head over to Bar Louie's when we get kicked out of Great Marsh for some more dancing and cocktails.
events.title: After Party

location.address: 6105 Great Marsh Pl, Bealeton, VA 22712, USA
location.title: Bar Louie
